name: Achieve
description:
Collect all the achievements to get out. A fast paced top down shooter with stylized pixel art.

Made in one week for the "Real Friendly Game Jam 2022". The idea came from all the games that made me feel bad for not having all the achievements (just ALL off them) u.u. (You know if you finished if you done all the achievements in the top left screen corner and now it is showing "YOU WON").

A (little) more buggy on the web version, if you can I suggest to play on the windows.

Hope you like it! Feel free to give any feedback.

Asset Credits:

Music from: 

Dithering shader from: https://godotshaders.com/shader/dither-gradient-shader/

Controls:

WASD - move

Left-Mouse - shoot

F - make hostage
